@Falloutt I love my bro, as we walked away he hit me on the back and told me i was an idiot and then started to chuckle. XD
@Parasidian I'm so nervous/awkward that I can never tell when a girl is actually interested in me. RIP.
Cute girl behind cash started to talk about One Piece since I was buying a figure. Apparently she was interested in me...so says my bro.
@Grexoz *slowly shakes head in disappoint*
@Grexoz Nope, see it again and come back with "This was a great movie".
